00051 void CNCychpHeader::clear()
00052 {
00053   m_strARRFileName.clear();
00054   m_strARRGuid.clear();
00055   m_strChpID.clear();
00056   m_ucXChromosome = 0;
00057   m_ucYChromosome = 0;
00058   m_eGender = affx::UnknownGender;
00059   m_fYTarget = 0;
00060   m_fMAPD = 0;
00061   m_fPVQC = 0;
00062   m_fCQC = -1;
00063   m_bXX = false;
00064   m_bY = false;
00065   m_iWavinessSegCount = -1;
00066 }

00181 void CNCychpHeader::setGenderFromString(const AffxString& strIn)
00182 {
00183   AffxString str = strIn;
00184   AffxString strTemp = str.toLowerCase();
00185   if (strTemp == "male") {
00186     setGender(affx::Male);
00187   } else if (strTemp == "female") {
00188     setGender(affx::Female);
00189   } else {
00190     setGender(affx::UnknownGender);
00191   }
00192 }
00193 
00194 AffxString CNCychpHeader::getGenderAsString()
00195 {
00196   return affx::getGenderString(m_eGender);
00197 }

00306 /**
00307  * Compare function.
00308  * @param that - A reference to an instance of this class.
00309  * @param iCompareCode - The code to switch on when doing compares. (Each code is a different compare.)
00310  * @return - int value. (-1 if *this < that, 0 if *this == that, 1 if *this > that)
00311  */
00312 int CNCychpChromosomesSummary::compareTo(CNCychpChromosomesSummary& that, int iCompareCode)
00313 {
00314   int iCompareResult = 0;
00315   switch (iCompareCode) {
00316   case 0:
00317     iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned char>::compare(m_ucChromosome, that.m_ucChromosome);
00318     break;
00319   }
00320   return iCompareResult;
00321 }

00333   m_fBAlleleSignal = 0;
00334   m_fSCAR = 0;
00335   m_cGenotypeCall = -1;
00336   m_bIsGenotypeCallSet = false;
00337   m_fGenotypeConfidence = 0;
00338   m_ucCnCall = 0;
00339   m_ucLohCall = 0;
00340   m_cSegmentInput = -1;
00341   m_cSegmentOutput = -1;

00344 CNCychpChromosomesSummaries::~CNCychpChromosomesSummaries()
00345 {
00346   clear();
00347 }
00348 void CNCychpChromosomesSummaries::clear()
00349 {
00350   deleteAll();
00351 }
00352 void CNCychpChromosomesSummaries::newCychpChromosomesSummary(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00353 {
00354   CNCychpChromosomesSummary* p = new CNCychpChromosomesSummary;
00355   u_int8_t uc = 0;
00356   u_int32_t ui = 0;
00357   float f = 0;
00358   AffxString str;
00359   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, uc);
00360   p->setChromosome(uc);
00361   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 1, str);
00362   p->setChromosomeDisplay(str);
00363   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 2, ui);
00364   p->setStartIndex(ui);
00365   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, ui);
00366   p->setMarkerCount(ui);
00367   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 4, f);
00368   p->setMinSignal(f);
00369   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 5, f);
00370   p->setMaxSignal(f);
00371   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 6, f);
00372   p->setMedianCnState(f);
00373   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 7, f);
00374   p->setHomFrequency(f);
00375   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 8, f);
00376   p->setHetFrequency(f);
00377   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 9, f);
00378   p->setMosaicism(f);
00379   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 10, f);
00380   p->setLOH(f);
00381   add(p);
00382 }
00383 
00384 /**
00385  * @brief Set the allele code ffor the genotype call from the internal representation (-1, 0, 1, 2)
00386  * @param char - The internal representation
00387  */
00388 void CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::setGenotypeCallFromCode(char c)
00389 {
00390   switch (c) {
00391   case ALLELE_NO_CALL: m_cGenotypeCall = -1; break;
00392   case ALLELE_A_CALL: m_cGenotypeCall = 0; break;
00393   case ALLELE_AB_CALL: m_cGenotypeCall = 1; break;
00394   case ALLELE_B_CALL: m_cGenotypeCall = 2; break;
00395   default: m_cGenotypeCall = -1;
00396   }
00397 }
00398 
00399 /**
00400  * Compare function.
00401  * @param that - A reference to an instance of this class.
00402  * @param iCompareCode - The code to switch on when doing compares. (Each code is a different compare.)
00403  * @return - int value. (-1 if *this < that, 0 if *this == that, 1 if *this > that)
00404  */
00405 int CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::compareTo(CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber& that, int iCompareCode)
00406 {
00407   int iCompareResult = 0;
00408   switch (iCompareCode) {
00409   case 0:
00410     iCompareResult = m_strProbeSetName.compareTo(that.m_strProbeSetName, 0);
00411     break;
00412   case 1:
00413     iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned char>::compare(m_ucChromosome, that.m_ucChromosome);
00414     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00415       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiPosition, that.m_uiPosition);
00416     }
00417     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00418       iCompareResult = m_strProbeSetName.compareTo(that.m_strProbeSetName, 0);
00419     }
00420     break;
00421   }
00422   return iCompareResult;
00423 }
00424 
00425 /**
00426  * @brief Return the CNNeutral call (0 or 1)
00427  * @param int - The sex code for this sample.
00428  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the X chromosome
00429  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the Y chromosome
00430  * @return char - The call
00431  */
00432 char CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::getCNNeutral(int iSexCode, int iXChromosome, int iYChromosome)
00433 {
00434   return (((getCNGain(iSexCode, iXChromosome, iYChromosome) == 0) && (getCNLoss(iSexCode, iXChromosome, iYChromosome) == 0)) ? (char)1 : (char)0);
00435 }
00436 
00437 /**
00438  * @brief Return the CNGain call (0 or 1)
00439  * @param int - The sex code for this sample.
00440  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the X chromosome
00441  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the Y chromosome
00442  * @return char - The call
00443  */
00444 char CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::getCNGain(int iSexCode, int iXChromosome, int iYChromosome)
00445 {
00446   char cCnGain = 0;
00447   if (m_ucChromosome == iXChromosome) {
00448     if (iSexCode == affx::Male) {
00449       if (m_ucCnCall > 1) {
00450         cCnGain = 1;
00451       }
00452     } else {
00453       if (m_ucCnCall > 2) {
00454         cCnGain = 1;
00455       }
00456     }
00457   } else if (m_ucChromosome == iYChromosome) {
00458     if (iSexCode == affx::Male) {
00459       if (m_ucCnCall > 1) {
00460         cCnGain = 1;
00461       }
00462     } else {
00463       if (m_ucCnCall > 0) {
00464         cCnGain = 1;
00465       }
00466     }
00467   } else {
00468     if (m_ucCnCall > 2) {
00469       cCnGain = 1;
00470     }
00471   }
00472   return cCnGain;
00473 }
00474 
00475 /**
00476  * @brief Return the CNLoss call (0 or 1)
00477  * @param int - The sex code for this sample.
00478  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the X chromosome
00479  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the Y chromosome
00480  * @return char - The call
00481  */
00482 char CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::getCNLoss(int iSexCode, int iXChromosome, int iYChromosome)
00483 {
00484   char cCnLoss = 0;
00485   if (m_ucChromosome == iXChromosome) {
00486     if (iSexCode == affx::Male) {
00487       if (m_ucCnCall < 1) {
00488         cCnLoss = 1;
00489       }
00490     } else {
00491       if (m_ucCnCall < 2) {
00492         cCnLoss = 1;
00493       }
00494     }
00495   } else if (m_ucChromosome == iYChromosome) {
00496     if (iSexCode == affx::Male) {
00497       if (m_ucCnCall < 1) {
00498         cCnLoss = 1;
00499       }
00500     } else {
00501       cCnLoss = 0;
00502       //                if (m_ucCnCall < 0) {cCnNLoss = 1;}
00503     }
00504   } else {
00505     if (m_ucCnCall < 2) {
00506       cCnLoss = 1;
00507     }
00508   }
00509   return cCnLoss;
00510 }
00511 
00512 /**
00513  * @brief Return the CNNeutralLOH call (0 or 1)
00514  * @param int - The sex code for this sample.
00515  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the X chromosome
00516  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the Y chromosome
00517  * @return char - The call
00518  */
00519 char CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::getCNNeutralLoh(int iSexCode, int iXChromosome, int iYChromosome)
00520 {
00521   char cCnNeutral = getCNNeutral(iSexCode, iXChromosome, iYChromosome);
00522   return (((cCnNeutral == 1) && (m_ucLohCall == 1)) ? (char)1 : (char)0);
00523 }
00524 
00525 /**
00526  * @brief Return the NormalDiploid call (0 or 1)
00527  * @param int - The sex code for this sample.
00528  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the X chromosome
00529  * @param int - The numeric value associated with the Y chromosome
00530  * @return char - The call
00531  */
00532 char CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::getNormalDiploid(int iSexCode, int iXChromosome, int iYChromosome)
00533 {
00534   char cCnNeutral = getCNNeutral(iSexCode, iXChromosome, iYChromosome);
00535   return (((cCnNeutral == 1) && (m_ucLohCall == 0)) ? (char)1 : (char)0);
00536 }

00548 void CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers::newCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00549 {
00550   CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* p = new CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber;
00551   u_int8_t uc = 0;
00552   u_int32_t ui = 0;
00553   float f = 0;
00554   AffxString str;
00555   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, str);
00556   p->setProbeSetName(str);
00557   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 1, uc);
00558   p->setChromosome(uc);
00559   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 2, ui);
00560   p->setPosition(ui);
00561   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, f);
00562   p->setLog2Ratio(f);
00563   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 5, f);
00564   p->setSmoothSignal(f);
00565   add(p);
00566 }
00567 
00568 void CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers::setCychpAlgorithmDataMarkerABSignal(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00569 {
00570   u_int32_t ui = 0;
00571   float f = 0;
00572   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, ui);
00573   CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* p = getAt(ui);
00574   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 1, f);
00575   p->setBAlleleSignal(f);
00576   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 2, f);
00577   p->setAAlleleSignal(f);
00578   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, f);
00579   p->setSCAR(f);
00580 }
00581 
00582 void CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers::setCychpGenotypingCalls(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00583 {
00584   u_int32_t ui = 0;
00585   int8_t c = 0;
00586   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, ui);
00587   CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* p = getAt(ui);
00588   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, c);    // ForcedCall column
00589   p->setGenotypeCallFromCode(c);
00590   p->setIsGenotypeCallSet(true);
00591 }

00692 /**
00693  * @brief Return the string associated with the segment type for this object.
00694  * @return AffxString - The segment type string.
00695  */
00696 AffxString CNCychpSegment::getSegmentType()
00697 {
00698   switch (m_uiDataSetIndex) {
00699   case 0: return "CN";
00700   case 1: return "LOH";
00701   case 2: return "CNNeutralLOH";
00702   case 3: return "NormalDiploid";
00703   case 4: return "Mosaicism";
00704   default: return "Unknown";
00705   }
00706   return "Unknown";
00707 }
00708 
00709 /**
00710  * Compare function.
00711  * @param that - A reference to an instance of this class.
00712  * @param iCompareCode - The code to switch on when doing compares. (Each code is a different compare.)
00713  * @return - int value. (-1 if *this < that, 0 if *this == that, 1 if *this > that)
00714  */
00715 int CNCychpSegment::compareTo(CNCychpSegment& that, int iCompareCode)
00716 {
00717   int iCompareResult = 0;
00718   switch (iCompareCode) {
00719   case 0:
00720     iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiDataSetIndex, that.m_uiDataSetIndex);
00721     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00722       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiSegmentID, that.m_uiSegmentID);
00723     }
00724     break;
00725   case 1:
00726     iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiDataSetIndex, that.m_uiDataSetIndex);
00727     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00728       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned char>::compare(m_ucChromosome, that.m_ucChromosome);
00729     }
00730     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00731       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiStartPosition, that.m_uiStartPosition);
00732     }
00733     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00734       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiStopPosition, that.m_uiStopPosition);
00735     }
00736     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00737       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiSegmentID, that.m_uiSegmentID);
00738     }
00739     break;
00740   }
00741   return iCompareResult;
00742 }
00743

00753 void CNCychpSegments::newCychpSegmentCN(unsigned int uiDataSetIndex, affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, unsigned int uiRowIndex)
00754 {
00755   CNCychpSegment* p = new CNCychpSegment;
00756   u_int8_t uc = 0;
00757   u_int32_t ui = 0;
00758   float f = 0;
00759   int32_t i = 0;
00760   AffxString str;
00761   p->setDataSetIndex(uiDataSetIndex);
00762   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 0, ui);
00763   p->setSegmentID(ui);
00764   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 1, uc);
00765   p->setChromosome(uc);
00766   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 2, ui);
00767   p->setStartPosition(ui);
00768   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, ui);
00769   p->setStopPosition(ui);
00770   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 4, i);
00771   p->setMarkerCount(i);
00772   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 5, ui);
00773   p->setMeanMarkerDistance(ui);
00774   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 6, f);
00775   p->setFState(f);
00776   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 7, f);
00777   p->setConfidence(f);
00778   add(p);
00779 }

00808 {

00820   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 2, ui);

00822   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 3, ui);
00823   p->setStopPosition(ui);

00830   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 8, f);
00831   p->setFState(f);
00832   pDataSet->GetData((int)uiRowIndex, 9, f);
00833   p->setMixture(f);
00834   add(p);

00988 /**
00989  * Read the CNCychp file, and store the data in memory.
00990  * @param strFileName - The name of the CNCychp file to load data from.
00991  * @return - bool value. (true if successful)
00992  */
00993 bool CNCychp::readFile(const AffxString& strFileName, AffxArray<CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber>& vProbeSets, bool bLoadProbeSetName, bool bNonNaNOnly)
00994 {
00995   AffxString strFamilialType = "";
00996   AffxString strPrompt = "";
00997   bool bSuccessful = false;
00998   clear();
00999   m_strFamilialType = strFamilialType;
01000   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
01001   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
01002   try {
01003     m_strFileName = Fs::convertToUncPath(strFileName);
01004 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01005     if (strPrompt == "") {
01006       Verbose::out(1, "Reading CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01007     } else {
01008       Verbose::out(1, "Reading " + strPrompt + ": " + m_strFileName);
01009     }
01010     reader.SetFilename(m_strFileName);
01011     reader.Open(genericData);
01012     loadHeader(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
01013     WStringVector vDataGroupNames;
01014     genericData.DataGroupNames(vDataGroupNames);
01015     for (unsigned int uiDataGroupIndex = 0; (uiDataGroupIndex < vDataGroupNames.size()); uiDataGroupIndex++) {
01016       AffxString strDataGroupName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataGroupNames[uiDataGroupIndex]);
01017 //            Verbose::out(1, " DataGroupName = " + strDataGroupName);
01018       WStringVector vDataSetNames;
01019       genericData.DataSetNames(uiDataGroupIndex, vDataSetNames);
01020       for (unsigned int uiDataSetIndex = 0; (uiDataSetIndex < vDataSetNames.size()); uiDataSetIndex++) {
01021         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet = genericData.DataSet(uiDataGroupIndex, uiDataSetIndex);
01022         AffxString strDataSetName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataSetNames[uiDataSetIndex]);
01023 //                Verbose::out(1, "  DataSetName = " + strDataSetName);
01024         loadDataSet(strDataGroupName, strDataSetName, uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, vProbeSets, bLoadProbeSetName, bNonNaNOnly);
01025       }
01026       setCnCalls();
01027       setLohCalls();
01028 //            Verbose::out(1, "*");
01029     }
01030 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01031     genericData.Clear();
01032     bSuccessful = true;
01033   } catch (...) {
01034     genericData.Clear(); error("Cannot read CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01035   }
01036   return bSuccessful;
01037 }
01038 
01039 /**
01040  * Read the CNCychp file, and store the data in memory.
01041  * @param strFileName - The name of the CNCychp file to load data from.
01042  * @return - bool value. (true if successful)
01043  */
01044 bool CNCychp::readFile(const AffxString& strFileName, const AffxString& strFamilialType, const AffxString& strPrompt)
01045 {
01046   bool bSuccessful = false;
01047   clear();
01048   m_strFamilialType = strFamilialType;
01049   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
01050   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
01051   try {
01052     m_strFileName = Fs::convertToUncPath(strFileName);
01053 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01054     if (strPrompt == "") {
01055       Verbose::out(1, "Reading CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01056     } else {
01057       Verbose::out(1, "Reading " + strPrompt + ": " + m_strFileName);
01058     }
01059     reader.SetFilename(m_strFileName);
01060     reader.Open(genericData);
01061     loadHeader(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
01062     WStringVector vDataGroupNames;
01063     genericData.DataGroupNames(vDataGroupNames);
01064     for (unsigned int uiDataGroupIndex = 0; (uiDataGroupIndex < vDataGroupNames.size()); uiDataGroupIndex++) {
01065       AffxString strDataGroupName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataGroupNames[uiDataGroupIndex]);
01066 //            Verbose::out(1, " DataGroupName = " + strDataGroupName);
01067       WStringVector vDataSetNames;
01068       genericData.DataSetNames(uiDataGroupIndex, vDataSetNames);
01069       for (unsigned int uiDataSetIndex = 0; (uiDataSetIndex < vDataSetNames.size()); uiDataSetIndex++) {
01070         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet = genericData.DataSet(uiDataGroupIndex, uiDataSetIndex);
01071         AffxString strDataSetName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataSetNames[uiDataSetIndex]);
01072 //                Verbose::out(1, "  DataSetName = " + strDataSetName);
01073         loadDataSet(strDataGroupName, strDataSetName, uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet);
01074       }
01075       setCnCalls();
01076       setLohCalls();
01077 //            Verbose::out(1, "*");
01078     }
01079 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01080     genericData.Clear();
01081     bSuccessful = true;
01082   } catch (...) {
01083     genericData.Clear(); error("Cannot read CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01084   }
01085   return bSuccessful;
01086 }
01087 
01088 /**
01089  * Selectively read the CNCychp file, and store the data in memory.
01090  * @param groupDatasets - map containing calvin group nad dataset names to be read
01091  * @param strFileName - The name of the CNCychp file to load data from.
01092  * @return - bool value. (true if successful)
01093  */
01094 bool CNCychp::readFile(const AffxString& strFileName, const groupDatasets_t& groupDatasets, const AffxString& strFamilialType, const AffxString& strPrompt)
01095 {
01096   bool bSuccessful = false;
01097   clear();
01098   m_strFamilialType = strFamilialType;
01099   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
01100   affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
01101   try {
01102     m_strFileName = Fs::convertToUncPath(strFileName);
01103 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01104     if (strPrompt == "") {
01105       Verbose::out(1, "Reading CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01106     } else {
01107       Verbose::out(1, "Reading " + strPrompt + ": " + m_strFileName);
01108     }
01109     reader.SetFilename(m_strFileName);
01110     reader.Open(genericData);
01111     loadHeader(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
01112     WStringVector vDataGroupNames;
01113     genericData.DataGroupNames(vDataGroupNames);
01114     for (unsigned int uiDataGroupIndex = 0; (uiDataGroupIndex < vDataGroupNames.size()); uiDataGroupIndex++) {
01115       AffxString strDataGroupName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataGroupNames[uiDataGroupIndex]);
01116       if (!isGroupPresent(groupDatasets, strDataGroupName)) {
01117         continue;
01118       }
01119       if (isGroupRedundant(strDataGroupName)) {
01120         continue;
01121       }
01122       //Verbose::out(1, " DataGroupName = " + strDataGroupName);
01123       WStringVector vDataSetNames;
01124       genericData.DataSetNames(uiDataGroupIndex, vDataSetNames);
01125       for (unsigned int uiDataSetIndex = 0; (uiDataSetIndex < vDataSetNames.size()); uiDataSetIndex++) {
01126         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet = genericData.DataSet(uiDataGroupIndex, uiDataSetIndex);
01127         AffxString strDataSetName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(vDataSetNames[uiDataSetIndex]);
01128         if (!isGroupDatasetPresent(groupDatasets, strDataGroupName, strDataSetName)) {
01129           delete pDataSet;
01130           continue;
01131         }
01132         //Verbose::out(1, "  DataSetName = " + strDataSetName);
01133         loadDataSet(strDataGroupName, strDataSetName, uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet);
01134       }
01135       if (false) { // TB replaced by calls to isGroupPresent() and isGroupDatasetPresent() as needed
01136         setCnCalls();
01137         setLohCalls();
01138       }
01139       //Verbose::out(1, "*");
01140     }
01141     //Verbose::out(1, "*");
01142     genericData.Clear();
01143     bSuccessful = true;
01144   } catch (...) {
01145     genericData.Clear(); error("Cannot read CNCychp file: " + m_strFileName);
01146   }
01147   return bSuccessful;
01148 }
01149 
01150 /**
01151  * Helper function: is the given group name present in the given group/dataset map
01152  * @param groupDatasets - map containing calvin group nad dataset names
01153  * @param groupName - calvin group name to check for in groupDatasets
01154  * @return - bool value. (true if groupDatasets contains groupName)
01155  */
01156 bool CNCychp::isGroupPresent(const groupDatasets_t& groupDatasets, const AffxString& groupName)
01157 {
01158   return groupDatasets.find(groupName) != groupDatasets.end();
01159 }
01160 
01161 bool CNCychp::isGroupRedundant(const AffxString& groupName)
01162 {
01163   // For future arrays elaborate as needed
01164 
01165   // Do not read AlgorithmData if array type is CytoScanHD
01166   return groupName == "AlgorithmData" && getCychpHeader().getArrayType() == "CytoScanHD_Array";
01167 }
01168 
01169 /**
01170  * Helper function: is the given group name AND dataset present in the given group/dataset map
01171  * @param groupDatasets - map containing calvin group nad dataset names
01172  * @param groupName - calvin group name to check for in groupDatasets
01173  * @param datasetName - calvin dataset name to check for in groupDatasets for group groupName
01174  * @return - bool value. (true if groupDatasets contains groupName/datasetName)
01175  */
01176 bool CNCychp::isGroupDatasetPresent(const groupDatasets_t& groupDatasets, const AffxString& groupName, const AffxString& datasetName)
01177 {
01178   bool status = false;
01179   groupDatasets_t::const_iterator pos = groupDatasets.find(groupName);
01180   if (pos != groupDatasets.end()) {
01181     if (pos->second.find(datasetName) != pos->second.end()) {
01182       status = true;
01183     }
01184   }
01185   return status;
01186 }
01187 
01188 
01189 /**
01190  * Load the CNCychp header into memory.
01191  * @param pHeader - A pointer to the affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader for the specified CNCychp file.
01192  */
01193 void CNCychp::loadHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader)
01194 {
01195   CNCychpHeader& header = getCychpHeader();
01196   affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType guid = pHeader->GetFileId();
01197   header.setChpID(guid);
01198   int iParamCount = pHeader->GetNameValParamCnt();
01199   affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
01200   bool bSelectedQCFound = m_selectedQC.empty();
01201   std::string paramName = "affymetrix-chipsummary-" + m_selectedQC;
01202   for (int iParamIndex = 0; (iParamIndex < iParamCount); iParamIndex++) {
01203     param = pHeader->GetNameValParam(iParamIndex);
01204     ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01205     if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-xChromosome") {
01206       header.setXChromosome((unsigned char)param.GetValueInt32());
01207     }
01208     ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01209     else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-yChromosome") {
01210       header.setYChromosome((unsigned char)param.GetValueInt32());
01211     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-Y-gender-call") {
01212       header.setGenderFromString(param.GetValueAscii());
01213     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-yTarget") {
01214       header.setYTarget(param.GetValueFloat());
01215     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-MAPD") {
01216       header.setMAPD(param.GetValueFloat());
01217     } else if ((m_selectedQC.empty() || (m_selectedQC == "snp-qc")) && StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-snp-qc") {
01218       header.setPVQC(param.GetValueFloat());
01219       if (!m_selectedQC.empty()) {header.setCQC(param.GetValueFloat());}    // special case to make sure "snp-qc" works for CQC.
01220       bSelectedQCFound = true;
01221     //} else if (m_selectedQC.empty() && StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-contrast-qc") {
01222     //  header.setCQC(param.GetValueFloat());
01223     } else if (m_selectedQC.empty() && StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-contrast-qc-nsp") {
01224       header.setCQC(param.GetValueFloat());
01225     } else if (!m_selectedQC.empty() && (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == paramName)) {
01226       header.setCQC(param.GetValueFloat());
01227       bSelectedQCFound = true;
01228     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-XX") {
01229       header.setXX(param.GetValueInt32());
01230     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-Y") {
01231       header.setY(param.GetValueInt32());
01232     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-chipsummary-waviness-seg-count") {
01233       header.setWavinessSegCount(param.GetValueInt32());
01234     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-ARR-file") {
01235       header.setARRFileName(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetValueText()));
01236     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-ARR-guid") {
01237       header.setARRGuid(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetValueText()));
01238     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-reference-input") {
01239       header.setCNReferenceFileName(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetValueText()));
01240     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-annotation-file") {
01241       header.setAnnotationFileName(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetValueText()));
01242     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-array-type") {
01243       header.setArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetValueText()));
01244     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-dbsnp-date") {
01245       header.setDbsnpDate(param.GetValueAscii());
01246     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-dbsnp-version") {
01247       header.setDbsnpVersion(param.GetValueAscii());
01248     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-netaffx-annotation-date") {
01249       header.setNetaffxAnnotDate(param.GetValueAscii());
01250     } else if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-netaffx-build") {
01251       header.setNetaffxBuild(param.GetValueAscii());
01252     }
01253   }
01254   if ((header.getXChromosome() == 0) || (header.getYChromosome() == 0)) {
01255     error("Cannot find affymetrix-algorithm-param-xChromosome and/or affymetrix-algorithm-param-yChromosome is CNCychp file header. FileName: " + m_strFileName);
01256   }
01257   if (m_selectedQC != "" && bSelectedQCFound == false)
01258   {
01259       error("Cannot find the parameter in the cychp file header associated with the selected QC. Parameter: " 
01260           + paramName  + ", selected-qc: " + m_selectedQC + ", file name: " + m_strFileName);
01261   }
01262   pHeader->Clear();
01263 }

01265 /**
01266  * Load the CNCychp DataSet into memory.
01267  * @param strDataGroupName - The name of the CNCychp file data group.
01268  * @param strDataSetName - The name of the CNCychp file data set.
01269  * @param pDataSet - A pointer to the affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet object.
01270  */
01271 void CNCychp::loadDataSet(const AffxString& strDataGroupName, const AffxString& strDataSetName, unsigned int uiDataSetIndex, affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet)
01272 {
01273   try {
01274     pDataSet->Open();
01275     if (strDataGroupName == "Chromosomes") {
01276       if (strDataSetName == "Summary") {
01277         getCychpChromosomesSummaries().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01278         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01279           getCychpChromosomesSummaries().newCychpChromosomesSummary(pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01280         }
01281       } else {
01282         pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data set name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", DataSet: " + strDataSetName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01283       }
01284     } else if (strDataGroupName == "ProbeSets") {
01285       if (strDataSetName == "CopyNumber") {
01286         getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01287         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01288           getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().newCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber(pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01289         }
01290       } else if (strDataSetName == "AllelePeaks") { // AllelePeaks is currrently only used for browser display.
01291 //                getCychpProbeSetsAllelePeaks().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01292 //                for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++)
01293 //                {
01294 //                    getCychpProbeSetsAllelePeaks().newCychpProbeSetsAllelePeaks(pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01295 //                }
01296       } else {
01297         pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data set name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", DataSet: " + strDataSetName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01298       }
01299     } else if (strDataGroupName == "AlgorithmData") {
01300       if (strDataSetName == "MarkerABSignal") {
01301         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01302           getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().setCychpAlgorithmDataMarkerABSignal(pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01303         }
01304       } else {
01305         pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data set name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", DataSet: " + strDataSetName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01306       }
01307     } else if (strDataGroupName == "Segments") {
01308       if (strDataSetName == "CN") {
01309         getCychpSegments().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01310         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01311           getCychpSegments().newCychpSegmentCN(uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01312         }
01313       } else if (strDataSetName == "LOH") {
01314         getCychpSegments().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01315         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01316           getCychpSegments().newCychpSegment(uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01317         }
01318       } else if (strDataSetName == "CNNeutralLOH") {
01319         getCychpSegments().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01320         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01321           getCychpSegments().newCychpSegment(uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01322         }
01323       } else if (strDataSetName == "NormalDiploid") {
01324         getCychpSegments().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01325         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01326           getCychpSegments().newCychpSegment(uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01327         }
01328       } else if (strDataSetName == "Mosaicism") {
01329         getCychpSegments().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01330         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01331           getCychpSegments().newCychpSegmentMosaicism(uiDataSetIndex, pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01332         }
01333       } else {
01334         pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data set name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", DataSet: " + strDataSetName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01335       }
01336     } else if (strDataGroupName == "Genotyping") {
01337       if (strDataSetName == "Calls") {
01338         for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); uiRowIndex++) {
01339           getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().setCychpGenotypingCalls(pDataSet, uiRowIndex);
01340         }
01341       } else {
01342         pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data set name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", DataSet: " + strDataSetName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01343       }
01344     } else {
01345       pDataSet->Delete(); error("The data group name in the CNCychp file is unexpected. DataGroup: " + strDataGroupName + ", File: " + m_strFileName);
01346     }
01347     pDataSet->Delete();
01348   } catch (...) {
01349     pDataSet->Delete();
01350     throw;
01351   }
01352 }
01353 
01354 /**
01355  * Load the CNCychp DataSet into memory.
01356  * @param strDataGroupName - The name of the CNCychp file data group.
01357  * @param strDataSetName - The name of the CNCychp file data set.
01358  * @param pDataSet - A pointer to the affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet object.
01359  */
01360 void CNCychp::loadDataSet(const AffxString& strDataGroupName, const AffxString& strDataSetName, unsigned int uiDataSetIndex, affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pDataSet, AffxArray<CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber>& vProbeSets, bool bLoadProbeSetName, bool bNonNaNOnly)
01361 {
01362   try {
01363     pDataSet->Open();
01364     if (strDataGroupName == "ProbeSets") {
01365       if (strDataSetName == "CopyNumber") {
01366         u_int8_t uc = 0;
01367         u_int32_t ui = 0;
01368         float f = 0;
01369         AffxString str;
01370         getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().reserve(pDataSet->Rows());
01371                 int uiRowIndex = 0;
01372         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < pDataSet->Rows()); iIndex++) {
01373           if (uiRowIndex >= vProbeSets.getCount()) {
01374             //Err::errAbort("Not enough Probe Sets allocated to hold the entire CYCHP file.");
01375                         break;
01376           }
01377           if (bLoadProbeSetName)
01378           {
01379               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 0, str); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setProbeSetName(str);
01380               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 1, uc); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setChromosome(uc);
01381               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 2, ui); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setPosition(ui);
01382               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 3, f); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setLog2Ratio(f);
01383                           if ((bNonNaNOnly) && (static_cast<double>(f) != static_cast<double>(f))) {continue;}
01384               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 5, f); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setSmoothSignal(f);
01385 
01386           }
01387           else
01388           {
01389               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 1, uc); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setChromosome(uc);
01390               pDataSet->GetData((int)iIndex, 3, f); vProbeSets[uiRowIndex]->setLog2Ratio(f);
01391                           if ((bNonNaNOnly) && (static_cast<double>(f) != static_cast<double>(f))) {continue;}
01392           }
01393                   uiRowIndex++;
01394         }
01395       }
01396     }
01397     pDataSet->Delete();
01398   } catch (...) {
01399     pDataSet->Delete();
01400     throw;
01401   }
01402 }
01403 
01404 /**
01405  * Determine the CN call values from the CycchpSegments data and set the CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber accordingly.
01406  */
01407 void CNCychp::setCnCalls()
01408 {
01409   CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers& vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers = getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers();
01410   CNCychpSegments& vCychpSegments = getCychpSegments();
01411   for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < vCychpSegments.getCount()); iSegmentIndex++) {
01412     CNCychpSegment* pSegment = vCychpSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
01413     if (pSegment->getDataSetIndex() == 0) { // CN
01414       for (int iMarkerIndex = 0; (iMarkerIndex < vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers.getCount()); iMarkerIndex++) {
01415         CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pMarker = vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers.getAt(iMarkerIndex);
01416         if (pMarker->getChromosome() == pSegment->getChromosome()) {
01417           if (pMarker->getPosition() >= pSegment->getStartPosition()) {
01418             if (pMarker->getPosition() <= pSegment->getStopPosition()) {
01419               pMarker->setCnCall((unsigned char)pSegment->getFState());
01420             }
01421           }
01422         }
01423       }
01424     }
01425   }
01426 }
01427 
01428 /**
01429  * Determine the LOH call values from the CNCychpSegments data and set the CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber accordingly.
01430  */
01431 void CNCychp::setLohCalls()
01432 {
01433   CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers& vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers = getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers();
01434   CNCychpSegments& vCychpSegments = getCychpSegments();
01435   for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < vCychpSegments.getCount()); iSegmentIndex++) {
01436     CNCychpSegment* pSegment = vCychpSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
01437     if (pSegment->getDataSetIndex() == 1) { // LOH
01438       for (int iMarkerIndex = 0; (iMarkerIndex < vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers.getCount()); iMarkerIndex++) {
01439         CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pMarker = vCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers.getAt(iMarkerIndex);
01440         if (pMarker->getChromosome() == pSegment->getChromosome()) {
01441           if (pMarker->getPosition() >= pSegment->getStartPosition()) {
01442             if (pMarker->getPosition() <= pSegment->getStopPosition()) {
01443               pMarker->setLohCall((unsigned char)pSegment->getFState());
01444             }
01445           }
01446         }
01447       }
01448     }
01449   }
01450 }

01452 /**
01453  * @brief a Xerces SAX Handler class for parsing XML
01454  */
01455 class ARRSAXHandler : public XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::HandlerBase
01456 {
01457 private:
01458   CNCychp* m_pCNCychp;
01459   unsigned int m_uiOptionCount;
01460 
01461 public :
01462   ARRSAXHandler(CNCychp* p) : m_pCNCychp(p), m_uiOptionCount(0) {
01463     if (m_pCNCychp == NULL) {
01464       Err::errAbort("ARRSAXHandler must be constructed with a valid CNCychp pointer.");
01465     }
01466   }
01467   ~ARRSAXHandler() {}
01468 
01469   unsigned int getOptionCount() const {
01470     return m_uiOptionCount;
01471   }
01472 
01473   void warning(const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParseException& exc) {
01474     Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: " + toString(exc.getMessage()));
01475   }
01476   void error(const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParseException& exc) {
01477     Err::errAbort(toString(exc.getMessage()));
01478   }
01479   void fatalError(const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParseException& exc) {
01480     Err::errAbort(toString(exc.getMessage()));
01481   }
01482 
01483   void startDocument() {
01484     m_uiOptionCount = 0;
01485   }
01486 
01487   /**
01488    * @brief Convert the internal representation to a std::string
01489    * @param const XMLCh* const - The pointer to convert
01490    * @return std::string - The resulting string value
01491    */
01492   static std::string toString(const XMLCh* const in) {
01493     char* p = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::transcode(in);
01494     std::string str = p;
01495     XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::release(&p);
01496     return str;
01497   }
01498 
01499   /**
01500    * @brief Do the XML parsing
01501    * @param const XMLCh* const - The pointer to the element name
01502    * @param XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::AttributeList& - The attribute list
01503    */
01504   void startElement(const XMLCh* const name, XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::AttributeList& attributes) {
01505     try {
01506       std::string strElementName = toString(name);
01507       //        Verbose::out(1, "Element=" + strElementName);
01508       m_uiOptionCount++;
01509       std::string strGuid;
01510       for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < attributes.getLength()); iIndex++) {
01511         std::string strAttributeName = toString(attributes.getName(iIndex));
01512         std::string strAttributeType = toString(attributes.getType(iIndex));
01513         std::string strAttributeValue = toString(attributes.getValue(iIndex));
01514         //            Verbose::out(1, "AttributeName=" + strAttributeName + ", AttributeType=" + strAttributeType + ", AttributeValue=" + strAttributeValue);
01515         if (strAttributeName == "GUID") {
01516           strGuid = strAttributeValue;
01517         }
01518       }
01519       if (strElementName == "ArraySetFile") {
01520         m_pCNCychp->setARRGuid(strGuid);
01521       }
01522     } catch (...) {
01523       Err::errAbort("ARRSAXHandler::startElement() failed.");
01524     }
01525   }
01526 };
01527 
01528 /**
01529  * @brief Load GUD from an XML file.
01530  * @param strFileName - The name of the XML file to load parameters from.
01531  */
01532 AffxString CNCychp::getGuidFromARRFile(const std::string& strFileName)
01533 {
01534   m_strARRGuid = "";
01535 //        Verbose::out(1, "*");
01536 //        Verbose::out(1, "Loading guid from file: " + strFileName);
01537   // Initialize the XML4C system
01538   try {
01539     XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
01540   }
01541 
01542   catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& toCatch) {
01543     Err::errAbort("CNCychp::getGuidFromXMLFile() failed at XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize(). Msg: " + ARRSAXHandler::toString(toCatch.getMessage()) + " FileName: " + strFileName);
01544   }
01545 
01546   //
01547   //  Create a SAX parser object to use and create our SAX event handlers
01548   //  and plug them in.
01549   //
01550   XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser* parser = new XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser;
01551   ARRSAXHandler handler(this);
01552   parser->setDocumentHandler(&handler);
01553   parser->setErrorHandler(&handler);
01554   parser->setValidationScheme(XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser::Val_Auto);
01555   parser->setDoNamespaces(false);
01556   parser->setDoSchema(false);
01557   parser->setValidationSchemaFullChecking(false);
01558 
01559   //
01560   //  Ok, lets do the progressive parse loop. On each time around the
01561   //  loop, we look and see if the handler has found what its looking
01562   //  for. When it does, we fall out then.
01563   //
01564   unsigned long duration;
01565   int errorCount = 0;
01566   try {
01567     // Create a progressive scan token
01568     XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPScanToken token;
01569     const unsigned long startMillis = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::getCurrentMillis();
01570     try {
01571       if (!parser->parseFirst(strFileName.c_str(), token)) {
01572         Err::errAbort("CNCychp::getGuidFromXMLFile() failed at parser->parseFirst(). FileName: " + strFileName);
01573       }
01574     } catch (...) {
01575       Err::errAbort("CNCychp::getGuidFromXMLFile() failed at parser->parseFirst(). FileName: " + strFileName);
01576     }
01577 
01578     //
01579     //  We started ok, so lets call scanNext() until we find what we want
01580     //  or hit the end.
01581     //
01582     bool gotMore = true;
01583     while (gotMore && !parser->getErrorCount()) {
01584       gotMore = parser->parseNext(token);
01585     }
01586 
01587     const unsigned long endMillis = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::getCurrentMillis();
01588     duration = endMillis - startMillis;
01589 
01590     errorCount = parser->getErrorCount();
01591     //
01592     //  Reset the parser-> In this simple progrma, since we just exit
01593     //  now, its not technically required. But, in programs which
01594     //  would remain open, you should reset after a progressive parse
01595     //  in case you broke out before the end of the file. This insures
01596     //  that all opened files, sockets, etc... are closed.
01597     //
01598     parser->parseReset(token);
01599   } catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::OutOfMemoryException&) {
01600     delete parser;
01601     XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
01602     Err::errAbort("CNCychp::getGuidFromXMLFile() failed with an OutOfMemoryException. FileName: " + strFileName);
01603   } catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& toCatch) {
01604     delete parser;
01605     XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
01606     Err::errAbort("CNCychp::getGuidFromXMLFile() failed with an XMLException. Msg: " + ARRSAXHandler::toString(toCatch.getMessage()) + " FileName: " + strFileName);
01607   }
01608 
01609 //    Verbose::out(1, "XMLFileName = " + strFileName + ", OptionCount = " + ToStr(handler.getOptionCount()));
01610 //    Verbose::out(1, "*");
01611   delete parser;
01612   XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
01613   return m_strARRGuid;
01614 }
